metadata.title: CVE-2018-13049 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The constructSQL function in inc/search.class.php in GLPI 9.2.x through9.3.0 allows SQL Injection, as demonstrated by triggering a crafted LIMITclause to front/computer.php.

criterions.comment: glpi: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
